summary: Completed testing of Trello bidirectional integration (Iteration 14). All 12 backend tests passed. Frontend UI verified - Trello Integration panel working correctly with sync buttons, connection status, and board info. 152 processes imported from Trello with Trello badges visible on Kanban cards.
passed_tests: GET /api/trello/status - Returns connected status with board info and 14 lists (PASS)
PUT /api/processes/kanban/{id}/move - Moves process and syncs to Trello (PASS)
PUT /api/processes/kanban/{id}/move to ch_aprovado - Previously broken, now working (PASS)
critical_code_review_comments: Trello integration is well implemented with proper error handling
Bidirectional sync works correctly - App → Trello and Trello → App
Webhook endpoints properly handle HEAD verification and POST events
Status mapping between Trello lists and system statuses is comprehensive
Previous iteration 13 bug (priority parameter) has been fixed
seed_data_creation: 152 processes imported from Trello board 'Lista de clientes'
context_for_next_testing_agent: Trello integration fully tested and working. 152 processes synced from Trello. All sync endpoints working (from-trello, to-trello, full, reset-and-sync). Webhook endpoints ready for real-time sync. Kanban move operation syncs to Trello automatically. Previous iteration 13 bug with 'priority' parameter has been fixed.

details: GET /api/trello/status returns connected=true
Board: Lista de clientes with 14 lists
All lists properly mapped to system statuses
POST /api/trello/sync/from-trello imports cards
Creates new processes or updates existing ones
152 processes imported successfully
POST /api/trello/sync/to-trello exports processes
Creates new cards or updates existing ones
Card descriptions include process details
PUT /api/processes/kanban/{id}/move syncs to Trello
Card moved to corresponding Trello list automatically
Works for all statuses including ch_aprovado (previously broken)
Settings > Sistema > Integração Trello panel visible
Shows connected status with green badge
Board info and mapped lists displayed
Sync buttons (Trello→App, App→Trello, Reset Total) working
Sync results displayed after operation
HEAD /api/trello/webhook returns 200 for verification
POST /api/trello/webhook handles events
GET /api/trello/webhook/list shows active webhooks

mocked_apis.note: NO MOCKED APIs - Real Trello integration tested
